0.question: Marcus had $450. He spent 2/5 of it on a DVD player. He then spent 1/3 of the remaining money on a jacket. How much money did Macus have left?

1.question: The teen club had a cupcake sale. They sold 2/3 of their cupcakes in the morning. They sold 1/6 of their cupcakes in the afternoon. They sold 200 cupcakes altogether. How many cupcakes were left to sell?

2.question: Chef Pillsbury purchased some eggs. He used 1/2 of them to make some pies. He used 1/4 of the remaining eggs to make a cake. He then had 15 eggs left. How many eggs had Chef Pillsbury purchased?

3.question: Leanne bought a bag of marbles. 3/8 of the marbles were green. 1/5 of the remaining marbles were red. If there were 6 red marbles, how many marbles were in the bag altogether?

4.question: Kara read 20 pages of her new book on Saturday. She read 1/4 of the remaining pages on Sunday. She still has 36 pages to read. How many pages are in Kara's book?
